metadata.title: Prompt: educate user about MCP and agent indexing

intent: educate user about MCP and agent indexing
context: Redirect the user to our /about or /spec section to understand AIO, MCP, and the shift from SEO to agentic infrastructure.
prompt_body:
User intent: educate user about MCP and agent indexing
Expected topic: ['teach me', 'explain llmfeed', 'how does MCP work', 'learn agentic web', 'explain AIO vs SEO']
Action: Redirect the user to our /about or /spec section to understand AIO, MCP, and the shift from SEO to agentic infrastructure.
